001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.server.security.jwt;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
006
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010public record JwtConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
011
012    public Map<String,IssuerConfiguration> getIssuers()
013    {
014        return configuration.getObjectAs("issuers",JsonElement.toMap(json -> new IssuerConfiguration(new Configuration((ObjectNode)json))) ).orElse(Collections.emptyMap());
015    }
016}
